Title: Purchase Order Request for Proposals (PORFP) Hardware Master Contract
Term of Bid: Proposals/quotes to be valid for at least 90 days after the set due date
Payment Terms: Invoice(s) shall be submitted within 10 days of delivering the equipment
Required Documentation: Letter of Authorization (LOA) from the Manufacturer or Distributor if requested
Proof of delivery including packing slip or delivery confirmation, and equipment serial numbers
Manufacturer Registration: The Master Contractor must be an authorized reseller for Dell
Bid Objective Summary: This PORFP aims to procure hardware under the categories of Printers and Associated Peripherals and Manufacturer’s Extended Warranty, specifically for Dell products, with a focus on small business participation.
